snippet: Hundreds of flights were canceled or delayed in the region on Saturday and, according to the National Weather Service, total snow accumulation in the area could reach up to 10 inches.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of flights were canceled or delayed in the region on Saturday and, according to the National Weather Service, total snow accumulation in the area could reach up to 10 inches.

headline.main: Snowstorm Causes Delays at New York Airports
headline.print_headline: Snowstorm Causes Delays at New York Airports
